|type         = Enemy Types

<section begin="EliteEnemyDesc" />Players will often find '''Elite Enemies''' in the open world while exploring, or in [[Domains]] and the [[Spiral Abyss]]. These enemies are stronger than [[Common Enemies]] and can drop some of the same [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material]]s that common enemies drop, as well as [[Artifacts]] and ascension materials exclusive to elite enemies. At low [[Adventure Rank#World Level and Ascension|World Levels]], elite enemies have also been noted to drop 1 and 2 star Weapons. Some Elite Enemies will serve as a mini-boss in certain quests.

'''Note:''' There are a limited number of spawns per day, which will reset daily according to whatever the [[World Reset Timers|Daily Reset Time]] is for the player's server/region.<section end="EliteEnemyDesc" />

All of them can drop 5 [[Mora]] per level, although the values vary based on difficulty - weak Elite Enemies, like [[Mitachurls]], cap at 200, moderates like adult [[Rifthounds]] cap at 400, while particularly strong and/or rares like [[Lawachurls]] cap at 600 Mora. They give three times as much [[Character EXP]] compared to Common Enemies at their level bracket. They may also drop the following [[Artifacts]]:
{{Artifact Set|Traveling Doctor|3|show_caption=1}}{{Artifact Set|Berserker|3-4|show_caption=1}}{{Artifact Set|Instructor|3-4|show_caption=1}}{{Artifact Set|The Exile|3-4|show_caption=1}}

There is a daily limit of killed '''Elite enemies''' yielding normal drops, the value is 400. Killing any more than that will drop nothing. This is not restricted by the world level, meaning that changing world level (for example in co-op) will not increase this limit.<!-- documented in Data Gathering discord server
Further kills yielded no exp/mora/artifacts/drops
